question: Which city organized the ‘India-ASEAN Business Summit' 2019’?
explanation: India-ASEAN Business Summit was held in New Delhi on November 11-12, 2019. The theme of the summit was ‘Today, Tomorrow and Together’. India ASEAN Business Summit aims to opportunities for deepening trade and investment ties between India and ASEAN, identify & fructify sector‐specific opportunities, resolution of trade barriers, B2B alignments, policy breakthroughs & signing of MoU& agreements etc.
